title: Brave Soul: A Healer's Journey into Spiritual Awakening
description: “No one said the road to destiny would be an easy one.”   A wake-up call for the journey of the soul, Amber finds herself in the midst of a spiritual awakening after a break up with her fiancé that sends him to the other side of the globe. She finds herself adrift until a remarkable visit from God changes her life.  Brave Soul is Amber’s personal account of events that transpired leading her onto the path of healer, psychic and medium. With her true calling realized, she helps others to discover their own path and purpose by being a beacon of light for those struggling in a sea of darkness.
author: Amber Nightingale
